      • changeDisplayName

        public boolean changeDisplayName(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String name)
        Change the user's displayname into a new name iff the user exists and the new name is not the same as the previous one.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user that is changing his or her displayname
        name - The new displayname the user is changing into
        Returns:
        True iff the user's displayname is changed. Else returns False
